PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Developing a Business model for Family Health International 360
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
FHI 360 is a nonprofit human development organization. Its expertise lies in creating a unique mix of capabilities to address today's interrelated development challenges in areas such as health, education, nutrition, economic development, civil society, environment, gender, youth, research and technology. It intended to set up a for profit enterprise for FHI 360 in India. 
In this regard, FHI 360 engaged EY to help them develop a cost effective and a financially viable business model. Also, assist them identify risks and legal requirements under the FHI India organization. 
I was engaged towards creating a viable business and financial model from FHI (India) and also explore various entity options which the organization could employ to set their offices in India.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Onshore and Offshore Chinese Yuan Currency Markets

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Designed and created an automated excel tool that analyses all the listed stocks in the US on various investment styles and objectives of Activist Investor (AI) and generates a list of companies that have a high likelihood of witnessing an investment by the AIs

Concocted an approach to estimate the cost of equity that accounts for the Discount for lack of Marketability (DLOM) and the Company Specific Discount, based on the various macroeconomic and company specific factors, used in Discounted Cash Flow technique for valuing private companies
